      • getCurrentMembers

        public static java.lang.Long getCurrentMembers(ServerGroup sg)
        Returns the value listed by current members column on the rhnServerGroup table.. This was made as a query instead of mapping because this column is only updated by the stored procedures dealing with entitlements..
        Parameters:
        sg - the server group to get the current members of
        Returns:
        the value of the the currentmemebers column.

      • listActiveServerIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> listActiveServerIds(ServerGroup sg,
                                                 java.lang.Long threshold)
        Returns a list of active server Ids associated to this servergroup Here active implies that the system has checked in after sysdate - threshold
        Parameters:
        sg - the server group to check systems on
        threshold - the threshold to check on
        Returns:
        the server ids
